name: Meidlinger Partners
overview:
Meidlinger Partners is an innovative private investment firm that seeks to maximize the value of its acquisitions in the cleantech sector.

Meidlinger relies on its team of experienced industry professionals to invest in and improve companies with high growth potential in the following areas: water resource and wastewater management, pollution reduction, energy efficiency, alternative energy and waste management. Meidlinger strongly believes that companies with a combination of superior management and a focus on sustainability will achieve high financial returns for their shareholders and stakeholders. Meidlinger’s mission is to be a driving force in the movement towards a more sustainable economy.

funding_round.source_description: Liberty Hydro Recieves $500,000 Investment from Meidlinger Partners

funds.name: Cleantech Fund
funds.source_description: Meidlinger Partners Launches New Cleantech Fund
